short_summary: Wharf reconstruction and maintenance of infrastructure
full_summary:
## F1571-220597 Wharf Reconstruction – Winter Harbour Small Craft Harbour

### Important Details

* **Reference Number**: WS3761542563-Doc3763028493
* **Publication Date**: November 23, 2022
* **Closing Date and Time**: December 9, 2022, 14:00:00
* **Region**: Winter Harbour, British Columbia, Canada
* **Contracting Authority**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Project Overview

The objective of this project is to reconstruct the wharf at the Winter Harbour Small Craft Harbour. The scope of work includes:

* Partial demolition and reconstruction of the wharf head
* Replacement of timber piles
* Replacement of gangway
* Replacement of wharf and float components

The project site is located in Winter Harbour Small Craft Harbour, at 108 Winter Harbour Road, Winter Harbour, BC V0N 3L0.

### Solicitation Details

The solicitation process for this project is by Invitation to Qualify. The procurement method is competitive, with selective tendering. The selection criteria will be based on the lowest price proposal.

### Contract Requirements

* Trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Limited tendering reason: None
* Regions of opportunity: None
* Regions of delivery: British Columbia and Canada

### Contact Information

* Contact name: Ngan, Ken (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact email: [ken.ngan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:ken.ngan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Notice URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14718777?extsite=MTQ3MTg3NzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14718777?extsite=MTQ3MTg3NzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
